short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide start offset of transcript on YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to hide the Transcript time on YouTube.
This is useful when you want to select a Transcript and translate it on the spot.
Also, the time of the video does not move when Transcript is clicked.
